title: Allow Pulling Custom OptProf Drops
body:
## Context
A huge issue with our pipeline builds is not being able to, at our discretion, choose an optprof drop to pull data from.

## Ideal Scenario
We can run a pipeline and set a variable like `OptProf Drop` to look for a specific drop and pull data from.

The trick might be to figure out how the build step in our pipeline determines this: 

![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/4691428/105752465-2c200e80-5efc-11eb-8ef8-cb12858a887e.png)
